feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 12:51 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or freezing drizzle at times mixed with ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
